alert.note: Alert for Grand (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 22 at 7:12PM MDT until June 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of north central Colorado, including the following county, Grand. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 712 PM MDT, emergency management reported rain and snowmelt in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hot Sulphur Springs and Hot Sulphur Spring.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
